Package org.drip.measure.statistics

Class MultivariateDiscrete

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.measure.statistics.MultivariateDiscrete
  • public class MultivariateDiscrete
extends java.lang.Object
    MultivariateDiscrete analyzes and computes the Moment and Metric Statistics for the Realized Multivariate Sequence.

    • Module = Numerical Core Module
    • Library = Numerical Optimizer Library
    • Project = Measure
    • Package = Statistics
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
